CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: full stellar jacket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The soft lead core is encased in a starsteel coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cosmic alloy-penetrating
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Specialist case of AP ammo, used to penetrate Cosmic Alloy-made armours.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cosmic alloy-penetrating Cosmic Matter-infused
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Specialist case of AP ammo, used to penetrate Cosmic Alloy-made armours, additionally infused with cosmic matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Cosmic Matter-coated
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Cosmic variant of incendiary ammo, these rounds are covered in sludgy Cosmic Matter form.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Eternium-filled
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shells filled with pure eternium shards.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cosmic matter-infused
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of HE Ammo, infused with Cosmic Matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cosmic matter-infused anti tank
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of HEAT Ammo, infused with Cosmic Matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: eternium-coated
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of Sabot Ammo, coated with Eternium.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: eternium crystal
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of shards used as crystal ammo.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Cosmic Matter-propelled
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of kinetic ammo, propelled with cosmic matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cosmic matter-charged
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of charged ammo, infused with cosmic matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: concentrated cosmic matter
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of AP charged ammo, containing expanding concentrated Cosmic Matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ionized cosmic matter
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Stellar equivalent of EMP charged ammo, containing ionized Cosmic Matter.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: cosmic alloy-contained plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Plasma ammo contained in cosmic alloy cartridges allowing for higher densities.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: starsteel-spiked plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Plasma ammo spiked with starsteel, giving it better flesh-rending capabilities.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: eternium-contained plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Plasma ammo contained in eternium, giving it better AP-capability.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Cosmic Matter-spiked plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Plasma ammo mixed with cosmic matter, giving it explosive properties.
